items.title: Stock market holiday today: BSE, NSE to remain shut for Guru Nanak Jayanti
items.description: Indian rupee ended marginally lower at 84.40 per dollar on Thursday versus Wednesday's close of 84.38.

items.title: MFs buy big amid market correction in October, target top Nifty stocks
items.description: FIIs sold over Rs 94,000 crore in October, while MFs made net purchases exceeding Rs 92,000 crore in local equities, according to NSDL data.

items.title: UPL board to meet on November 20 to determine rights issue price, entitlement, dates
items.description: UPL Ltd.'s board is set to finalize details for its reduced $400 million rights issue, while aiming for margin improvements despite recent financial pressures.

items.title: Glenmark Pharmaceuticals PAT at Rs 354 crore in September quarter
items.description: The company reported a consolidated loss after tax of Rs 180.3 crore in the same quarter last fiscal, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals said in a regulatory filing
